candidates.title: Salsify the crate graph

labels.name: S-waiting-on-review
labels.description: Status: Awaiting review from the assignee but also interested parties.

candidates.body:
I.e. make it not one giant input but multiple, for incrementality and decreased memory usage for Salsa 3 reasons.

This means that changing the metadata of a crate (e.g. adding a dependency) invalidates only it.

Draft for now because I still need to review the after-rebase changes.
